metadata.title: Thursday, 27th June, 2019
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) how many times the mobile hospitals operated in the following Wards in Solwezi East Parliamentary Constituency in 2018:
(b) whether there are any plans to send mobile hospitals to the Constituency in 2019. 422. Mr Chali (Nchanga) - To ask the Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development:
(a) when the construction of the Luano Kapisha Secondary School in Nchanga Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the project is; and

(c) what the time frame for the completion of the project is. NOTICE OF MOTION AND ORDER OF THE DAY Dr M Malama, MP Report of the Committee on National Security and Foreign Affairs: That this House do adopt the Report of the Committee on National Security and Foreign Affairs for the Third Session of the Twelfth National Assembly, laid on the Table of the House on 17th June, 2019. 1. Report of the Committee on National Economy, Trade and Labour Matters - (26th June) - Resumption of Debate: (Mr Mung’andu, MP). ___________________________
